about_the_game:
Apocalyptic Cat is an atmospheric and hardcore platformer that tells the story of a little black cat journeying through a toxic and desolate post-apocalyptic world, devoid of all life. The player's goal is to guide the cat upwards towards the heavens, navigating through toxic clouds, dangerous spikes, and stone obstacles to fulfill the cat's final and only dream of reaching a majestic paradise after its time on the scorched earth.



Key Features:

  • Atmospheric Experience:

    Immerse yourself in a hauntingly beautiful post-apocalyptic environment with stunning visuals and a captivating soundtrack that enhances the sense of desolation and hope.

  • Challenging Gameplay:

    Engage in hardcore platforming with precise controls, where every jump and movement must be carefully timed to avoid deadly obstacles and reach higher grounds.

  • Intriguing Storyline:

    Follow the touching narrative of the little black cat, whose sole desire is to escape the ruined world and find peace in paradise, providing emotional depth to the gameplay.

  • Unique Level Design:

    Navigate through creatively designed levels featuring toxic clouds, sharp spikes, and treacherous stone barriers, each presenting unique challenges that test your platforming skills and strategic thinking.
detailed_description:
Feature List


About the Game


Apocalyptic Cat is an atmospheric and hardcore platformer that tells the story of a little black cat journeying through a toxic and desolate post-apocalyptic world, devoid of all life. The player's goal is to guide the cat upwards towards the heavens, navigating through toxic clouds, dangerous spikes, and stone obstacles to fulfill the cat's final and only dream of reaching a majestic paradise after its time on the scorched earth.



Key Features:

  • Atmospheric Experience:

    Immerse yourself in a hauntingly beautiful post-apocalyptic environment with stunning visuals and a captivating soundtrack that enhances the sense of desolation and hope.

  • Challenging Gameplay:

    Engage in hardcore platforming with precise controls, where every jump and movement must be carefully timed to avoid deadly obstacles and reach higher grounds.

  • Intriguing Storyline:

    Follow the touching narrative of the little black cat, whose sole desire is to escape the ruined world and find peace in paradise, providing emotional depth to the gameplay.

  • Unique Level Design:

    Navigate through creatively designed levels featuring toxic clouds, sharp spikes, and treacherous stone barriers, each presenting unique challenges that test your platforming skills and strategic thinking.
name: Apocalyptic cat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Apocalyptic Cat is an atmospheric hardcore platformer about a little black cat's journey in a post-apocalyptic world. Overcome toxic clouds, spikes, and obstacles, striving to fulfill his last dream of reaching paradise.
